LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_InsectKill.label: Insect Killer Grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_InsectKill.description: Grenade that applies a caustic neurotoxin as a foam. The chemicals associated with this grenade will break down and combust with exposed insectoid flesh and fluids.
LanguageData.Grenade_USInsectKill.label: Insect Killer Grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_MindKill.label: Mind Killer Grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_MindKill.description: Grenade that applies mind killer gas. The chemicals associated with this grenade will detrimentally effect the mind.
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_MindKill.verbs.0.label: throw mind killer grenade
LanguageData.Grenade_USMindKill.label: Mind Killer Grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_TangleKill.label: Tangle Killer Grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_TangleKill.description: Grenade that applies tangle kill gas.
LanguageData.Grenade_USTangleKill.label: Tangle Killer Grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_GlowStick.label: Glow Sticks
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_GlowStick.description: Glow Sticks, contianed within the transparent container is luminescent liquid.
LanguageData.Weapon_USGrenade_GlowStick.verbs.0.label: throw glow stick
LanguageData.Grenade_USGlowStick.label: Glow Stick
